name: coopfox
description: Collaborative Web Browsing in Firefox (master's thesis at the Cooperative Media Lab, University of Bamberg, Germany)
author: Ralf Strobel

preferences.name: alwaysConnected
preferences.title: Always Stay Connected
preferences.description: Connect on FireFox startup and do not disconnect, even when no sidebar is active.

preferences.name: allWindows
preferences.title: Enable for New Windows
preferences.description: Show the CoopFox sidebar by default in new windows.

preferences.name: publishUrl
preferences.title: Show URL to Coop Partners
preferences.description: CoopChat parters can see the web page in your active tab by default (can be changed per session).

preferences.name: syncColors
preferences.title: Synchronize Colors
preferences.description: Determine the colors of CoopChat contacts by their join order, so that all participants see them identically. Otherwise, you will always show up red and other colors will be random.

preferences.name: ignoreBadCerts
preferences.title: Ignore Invalid Server Certificates
preferences.description: Connect to XMPP servers using encrypted communication, even if they do not provide a trusted SSL certificate. If you disable this option, you will be prompted once for each server.
